Let The Game Start

The Swiss Hacking Challenge starts soon Dear Hacking-Lab User, there will be a European Cyber Security Challenge again this year - let the games begin! Germany is first again, and starts its national online qualification today, in Hacking-Lab. Subscribe via RSS

About Us

The Swiss Cyber Storm is a non profit organization hosting the international Swiss Cyber Storm Conference and running the Swiss Hacking Challenge - the Swiss Qualifying for the European Cyber Security Challenges - with a strong focus of identifying and supporting young cyber talents.
